# Resumen de investigación:
I am a plant ecologist which uses spatial statistical approaches to disentangle how biotic and abiotic factors determine spatio-temporal pattern in plant species. 
My actual post-doctoral project focus in the study of how tree crown moves in response to intra and inter species competition.
I like modelling and applying different (new) statistical tools/ techniques to spatial data, being also very interested in LIDAR information.

#  Interés profesional dentro del grupo:
Compartir y aprender nuevas técnicas de análisis espaciales. Aplicarlo a circular statistics. 
Como compartir script y que repositorios usar.
